title: Median age of the population in New Zealand 2015
summary: In general Median age in years has rose over the Year.
Median age in years is slightly increasing from 2025 to 2040.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2030 and 2035.
Maximum Median age in years, about 42.3 was reported at Year 2040
Minimum Median age in years about 38.9 was reached at Year 2025
min_summary: In general Median age in years has rose over the Year.
Median age in years is slightly increasing from 2025 to 2040.
